subject: Football (College)
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: New documents filed by the lawyers for the former Penn State assistant coach Jerry Sandusky suggest there are at least 17 accusers in the child sexual abuse case against him.
snippet: New documents filed by the lawyers for the former Penn State assistant coach Jerry Sandusky suggest there are at least 17 accusers in the child sexual abuse case against him.
